error.cors:
Error: Local Environment Setup Required
To run this application locally on web, please use the following command:
flutter run -d chrome --web-browser-flag "--disable-web-security"
This step is necessary to bypass CORS restrictions during local development. Please note that this flag should only be used in a development environment and never in production.
